test_name: Physical Layer and Data Link Layer
test_description: This test covers topics related to the Physical and Data Link layers, including transmission media, switching techniques, error detection and correction, data link protocols, and medium access control.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a guided transmission medium?
What is the main advantage of fiber optic cables over copper wires?
questions.options_b: Higher bandwidth and immunity to electromagnetic interference

questions.question: Which switching technique establishes a dedicated path between sender and receiver?
What is the purpose of the cyclic redundancy check (CRC) in the Data Link layer?
questions.options_b: To detect errors in transmitted frames

questions.question: Which error detection method uses parity bits?
What is the purpose of framing in the Data Link layer?
questions.options_a: To determine which device can transmit at a given time
questions.options_b: To identify the start and end of a frame

questions.question: Which sliding window protocol allows for selective retransmission of frames?
What is the main purpose of flow control in the Data Link layer?
questions.options_a: To prevent a fast sender from overwhelming a slow receiver

questions.question: Which medium access control protocol uses collision detection?
What is the data rate of standard Ethernet?
Which of the following is a controlled access method?
What is the purpose of the preamble in an Ethernet frame?
questions.options_a: To identify the source and destination addresses

questions.question: Which field in an Ethernet frame is used for error detection?
What is the main advantage of Fast Ethernet over standard Ethernet?
Which wireless transmission method uses frequency hopping?
What is the purpose of piggybacking in data link protocols?
questions.options_a: To combine acknowledgment with data frames

questions.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of Gigabit Ethernet?
What is the purpose of the token in token passing protocols?
questions.options_b: To determine which station can transmit

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a function of the Data Link layer?
What is the maximum data rate of 10-Gigabit Ethernet?
